HectorException

shutdown

public void shutdown()
Controlled shutdown of pool. Go through the list of available clients in the queue and call HClient.close() on each. Toggles a flag to indicate we are going into shutdown mode. Any subsequent calls will throw an IllegalArgumentException.

Specified by:
shutdown in interface HClientPool
